title: shrI sakala gaNAdhipa
sahitya:
shrI sakala gaNAdhipa pAlayamAm anisham vara siddhi vinAyaka bhakta 
janALi pOSa vara candramauLI suta shrI sakala gaNAdhipa pAlayamAm anisham


anupallavi

  dAsArcita pAda bhAsurAnga karuNA samudra vara vAyu putra hanumanta 
vara prada shrI sakala shivankara mAruti mAmavatu vara rAma sunAma sudhA 
rasapAna dInajana bhakta bhayApaha shrI sakala shivankara mAruti mAmavatu 


caraNam    nanda nandana vandanamastutE kundaradana mukunda murahara mandarOddhara vandita budhajana brnda hrdaya nivAsa sundara manda hasita vadanAravinda makaranda pAna sangIta sudhAkara shrI sakala kaLA paripUrNa dayAsharadE varadA bhaya dAyaka mAmava mangaLAnga muraLIrava mOhana shrI sakala kaLA paripUrNa dayAsharadE shrI sakala shivankara mAruti mAmavatu shrI sakala gaNAdhipa pAlayamAm anisham
